issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.
status.name: Closed

fields.description: There is a typo in setActivityType where accuracy is being set instead of activityType

comments.body:
[~ben.bahrenburg@gmail.com], [~ingo] 

Are there reproducible steps for this ticket?
Apologizes this was fixed as part of this PR https://github.com/appcelerator/titanium_mobile/pull/4454.

Verified fixed on:
Mac OSX 10.9 Mavericks
Titanium SDK, build: 3.2.0.v20131212122847
CLI: 3.2.0-cr3

GeolocationModule.m now has
{code}setActivityType:activityType{code}
instead of
{code}setActivityType:accuracy{code}

Closing.
